column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Today I have to go grocery shopping .
#text=I plan a list of meals for the next week .
#text=Then I go to the kitchen and look to see what I have already and what I need to buy .
#text=I make a list of the items that I need to get and gather any coupons I have for the items on my list .
#text=I get in the car and drive to the store .
#text=I get my grocery card and go through the isles gathering my items marking each on off the list that I put in the cart .
#text=I give all my items to the cashier to ring up .
#text=After she is through ringing up the items I hand her my coupons .
#text=After she scans my coupons she gives me the total I need to pay for my groceries .
#text=I give her my money and wait for my change .
#text=I load my bags in the grocery cart and take them to my car .
#text=I drive home and bring my groceries inside .
#text=I put each of the items in the kitchen where they belong .
